table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));

table.name: vte_custom_header_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_custom_header_settings` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `header` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `icon` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `color` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `field_name` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `sequence` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, `active` int(1) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
